text: Hilarie Burton & Jeffrey Dean Morgan are new parents again! Over 7 years after the birth of their son, the stars have welcomed a precious little girl — we are SO thrilled! Congrats to Hilarie Burton, 35, and her husband Jeffrey Dean Morgan, 51! The duo have officially expanded their family, announcing the exciting news on March 1 via Twitter, after the One Tree Hill star gave birth. The two are already the proud parents of 7 - year - old son Augustus “ Gus ” Morgan, and now they have a second child — a baby GIRL — to shower with love!
